thread.title: New Xbox Insider Preview build will revamp the Guide, Cortana, and much more
thread.title_full: New Xbox Insider Preview build will revamp the Guide, Cortana, and much more

author: Jez Corden
title: New Xbox Insider Preview build will revamp the Guide, Cortana, and much more
text:
As we detailed all the way back in November, a revamped Guide, a fresh Cortana interface and much more is heading out to Xbox Insiders in waves.
Last November we wrote about how Microsoft was working on a new Guide for the Xbox One, accessible via a single tap of the home button. Xbox Insiders will get a taste of that very shortly, as the new update begins heading out in waves.
